Uses of Interface
org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.dialect.JdbcDialect

  • Packages that use JdbcDialect 
    Package Description
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc
    Contains reference JDBC-based cache store implementation.
    org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.dialect
    Contains SQL dialects for different RDBMS.
